description:
Several hundred years ago, humans were nearly exterminated by titans. Titans are typically several stories tall, seem to have no intelligence, devour human beings and, worst of all, seem to do it for the pleasure rather than as a food source. A small percentage of humanity survived by walling themselves in a city protected by extremely high walls, even taller than the biggest of titans.
Flash forward to the present and the city has not seen a titan in over 100 years. Teenage boy http://anidb.net/ch51115 [Eren] and his foster sister http://anidb.net/ch51116 [Mikasa] witness something horrific as the city walls are destroyed by a super titan that appears out of thin air. As the smaller titans flood the city, the two kids watch in horror as their mother is eaten alive. Eren vows that he will murder every single titan and take revenge for all of mankind.
Source: MangaHelpers
Note: The last episode received a pre-airing in Tokyo, Marunouchi Piccadilly 1 theater. TV broadcast took place after midnight, a few hours later.

REGULAR.description:
After 100 years, peace is broken by the appearance of a fifty meter tall Titan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An dich in 2000 Jahren – Der Fall von Shiganshina, Teil 1
Nisen-nengo no Kimi e: Shiganshina Kanraku (1)
To You, 2000 Years in the Future: The Fall of Zhiganshina (1)
À toi qui vis 2000 ans plus tard
二千年後の君へ シガンシナ陥落①

REGULAR.description:
As Titans continue to rampage, the townspeople gather at the inner gate. But a new Titan breaks through and this one is unlike the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An jenem Tag – Der Fall von Shiganshina, Teil 2
Ce jour-là ~2) La chute de Shiganshina~
Sono Hi: Zhiganshina Kanraku (2)
That Day: The Fall of Zhiganshina (2)
その日 シガンシナ陥落②

REGULAR.description:
Eren begins his training with the Cadet Corps, but questions about his painful past overwhelm him. When he struggles with a maneuvering exercise, Berholt and Reiner offer kindly advice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dim Light in the Darkness of Despair: Humanity Rises Again (1)
Ein fahles Licht inmitten der Verzweiflung – Die Rückkehr der Menschheit, Teil 1
Une faible étincelle dans le désespoir ~Le réveil de l`humanité~
Zetsubou no Naka de Nibuku Hikaru: Jinrui no Saiki (1)
絶望の中で鈍く光る 人類の再起①

REGULAR.description:
Annie proves her skill in a sparring session, Jan dreams of serving alongside the King, and graduation day brings shocking revelations - along with a sudden outbreak of violence!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Nacht der Abschlusszeremonie – Die Rückkehr der Menschheit, Teil 2
Kaisanshiki no Yoru: Jinrui no Saiki (2)
Le soir de la cérémonie de fin d`entraînement ~Le réveil de l`humanité~
Night of the Graduation Ceremony: Humanity Rises Again (2)
解散式の夜 人類の再起②

REGULAR.description:
Eren faces off against the Colossal Titan after it appears out of nowhere and knocks a strategic hole in the Rose Wall gate. As Titans swarm the city, the newly graduated Cadets are called in to fight in brutal battle that won`t be without casualties.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feuertaufe – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 1
First Battle: Battle of Trost (1)
Première bataille ~La lutte pour le district Trost~
Uijin: Trost-ku Koubousen (1)
初陣 トロスト区攻防戦①

REGULAR.description:
Armin tries to cope with the loss of his friends and allies after Titans massacre his squad. Elsewhere in the city, Mikasa manages to take out several of the monsters, which brings back tragic memories of her past and the first time she met Eren.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Welt durch die Augen eines Mädchens – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 2
Shoujo ga Mita Sekai: Trost-ku Koubousen (2)
The World the Girl Saw: Battle for Trost (2)
Une petite lame ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
少女が見た世界 トロスト区攻防戦②

REGULAR.description:
After the retreat bell sounds, many cadets find themselves without enough fuel to scale the wall back to safety. Mikasa begins to lose hope once she hears of the deaths in Armin`s squad, but the appearance of a new type of Titan stokes her will to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Yaiba: Trost-ku Koubousen (3)
Courte lame ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
Eine kleine Klinge – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 3
The Small Blade: The Battle for Trost (3)
小さな刃 トロスト区攻防戦③

REGULAR.description:
Armin comes up with a risky plan that pits Titan against Titan as the abandoned Cadets attempt to take back their headquarters. Getting into the building might be possible, but getting out alive and refueled will mean facing more of the giants.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hearing the Heartbeat: The Battle for Trost (4)
Ich kann seinen Herzschlag hören – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 4
J`entends les battements de ton cœur ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
Shinzou no Kodou ga Kikoeru: Trost-ku Koubousen (4)
心臓の鼓動が聞こえる トロスト区攻防戦④

REGULAR.description:
A miraculous return is met with anger and fear. Cannons are fixed on Eren as he struggles to remember what happened to him inside the belly of a monster and how he ended up humankind`s enemy. One question is all that matters: is Eren human or Titan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Verbleib des linken Arms – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 5
Hidari Ude no Yukue: Trost-ku Koubousen (5)
Qu`est-il advenu du bras gauche ? ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
Where the Left Arm Went: The Battle for Trost (5)
左腕の行方 トロスト区攻防戦⑤

REGULAR.description:
Cadets respond to Eren`s terrifying transformation with doubt and fear as he struggles to understand it himself. If Armin can`t talk the commander into using Eren`s newfound powers for the good of humankind, all hope of stopping the Titans might be lost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Reaktion – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 6
Kotaeru: Trost-ku Koubousen (6)
Response: The Battle for Trost (6)
Répondre ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
応える トロスト区攻防戦⑥

REGULAR.description:
Plans are created to use Eren`s Titan powers to seal the hole in the wall in an attempt to reclaim Trost. But with the government`s bloodstained history and vocal dissenters in the military ranks, the biggest threat to humankind may not be the Titans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Idol – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 7
Guuzou: Trost-ku Koubousen (7)
Icon: The Battle for Trost (7)
Idole ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
偶像 トロスト区攻防戦⑦

REGULAR.description:
The plan to reclaim Trost falls apart when Eren`s newfound powers turn him into a mindless giant. As Titans continue to swarm the city, it`s up to Armin and Mikasa to make sure the cadets massacred during the mission haven`t died in vain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blessure ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
Die Wunde – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 8
Kizu: Trost-ku Koubousen (8)
Wound: The Battle for Trost (8)
傷 トロスト区攻防戦⑧

REGULAR.description:
Jean takes desperate measures to replace his broken maneuvering device. Meanwhile, Eren is able to plug the hole in the wall thanks to the help of his fellow cadets, but the cost of humanity`s first victory against the Titans will be gigantic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Désir primitif ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
Genshoteki Yokkyuu: Trost-ku Koubousen (9)
Primal Desires: The Battle for Trost (9)
Urtrieb – Schlacht um den Bezirk Trost, Teil 9
原初的欲求 トロスト区攻防戦⑨

REGULAR.description:
The people all react in different ways to the story of Eren`s titan power.  The further inside the walls they live, the more they fear him as a demon that must be destroyed, while those who live near the outside see him as a savior.  The government must decide whether to send him to the Military Police or the Survey Team.  The two groups collide as the Inquiry begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mada Me o Mirenai: Hangeki Zen`ya (1)
Noch nicht fähig, in die Augen zu sehen – Am Vorabend der Gegenoffensive, Teil 1
On ne peut pas le regarder dans les yeux ~La lutte pour le district de Trost~
Still Can`t See: Night Before the Counteroffensive (1)
まだ目を見れない 反撃前夜①

REGULAR.description:
After the Inquiry Eren is assigned to the Survey Team`s special operations squad, known as "Squad Levi."  The Squad is composed of the best troops the survey team has, but they`re all very strange people.  With a major mission 30 days away, Eren hears from Hanji about the experiments on the titans from Trost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Ops Squad: Night Before the Counteroffensive (2)
Spezialkommando – Am Vorabend der Gegenoffensive, Teil 2
Tokubetsu Sakusen-han: Hangeki Zen`ya (2)
Unité d`intervention ~La veille de la contre-attaque~
特別作戦班 反撃前夜②

REGULAR.description:
The two Titans the Survey Corps captured have been killed by a mysterious assassin.  Suspicion centers on the trainees of the 104th, and each is questioned in turn.  In the end the assassin is never found.  Each of the trainees makes the most important decision of his life: which branch of the military they`ll be joining.  Erwin stands before them and reveals information which was supposed to be kept hidden...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce qu`il faut faire maintenant ~La veille de la contre-attaque~
Ima, Nani o Subeki ka: Hangeki Zen`ya (3)
Was getan werden muss – Am Vorabend der Gegenoffensive, Teil 3
What Should Be Done: Night Before the Counteroffensive (3)
今, 何をすべきか 反撃前夜③

REGULAR.description:
The 57th Expedition outside the walls begins when Eren and the rest of the 104th Trainees join the survey corps.  They use the long-range recon formation to avoid encountering the Titans as much as possible as they head for their goal.  But Armin encounters a sentient female titan inside the formation and is put in grave danger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der weibliche Titan – Die 57. Expedition hinter die Mauer, Teil 1
Female Titan: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (1)
Le titan féminin ~ La 57e expédition extra-muros ~
Megata no Kyojin: Dai 57 Kai Hekigai Chousa (1)
女型の巨人 第57回壁外調査①

REGULAR.description:
The Female Titan destroys the recon capability of the survey team`s right wing.  They thought the order to retreat would be issued, but instead the Commander orders them to change direction and continue the mission.  Meanwhile the Female Titan is charging through the formation and killing the survey corps members.  And then, she gets close enough for Eren and the rest of Levi`s squad to see her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Wald der Baumriesen – Die 57. Expedition hinter die Mauer, Teil 2
Forest of Giant Trees: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (2)
Kyodaiju no Mori: Dai 57 Kai Hekigai Chousa (2)
La forêt des arbres géants: La 57e expédition extra-muros
巨大樹の森 第57回壁外調査②

REGULAR.description:
The Female Titan approachs the professional Titan-killers in Team Levi from behind. However, Levi Squad refuses to help the soldiers who try to slow her down, and charges forward. "Why are we just letting them die?" Eren asks. "I don`t understand why you won`t explain?" Then Levi offers him a choice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bite: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (3)
Der Biss – Die 57. Expedition hinter die Mauer, Teil 3
Kamitsuku: Dai 57 Kai Hekigai Chousa (3)
Morsure: La 57e expédition extra-muros
噛みつく 第57回壁外調査③

REGULAR.description:
The Survey Team succeeds in pinning the Female Titan in the Forest of Giant Trees, but at a great cost.  The majority of the corps, which didn`t know Erwin`s true plan, finally understands.  The trapped Titan releases a dying scream, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Erwin Smith ~La 57e expédition extra-muros~
Erwin Smith – Die 57. Expedition hinter die Mauer, Teil 4
Erwin Smith: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (4)
Erwin Smith: Dai 57 Kai Hekigai Chousa (4)
エルヴィン・スミス 第57回壁外調査④

REGULAR.description:
The Female Titan lets the other Titans devour her body and disappears in a puff of steam. The person inside is wearing the same uniform as the rest of the Survey Corps, and goes after Eren. They kill Gunther as he protects Eren, and then assume Female Titan form again. Oluo, Eld, and Petra work together to fight it, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coup dur ~La 57e expédition extra-muros~
Crushing Blow: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (5)
Ein harter Schlag – Die 57. Expedition hinter die Mauer, Teil 5
Tettsui: Dai 57 Kai Hekigai Chousa (5)
鉄槌 第57回壁外調査⑤

REGULAR.description:
Mikasa follows the female Titan to regain Eren.  Levi catches up wtih her and they give up on killing the Titan and resign themselves to simply recapturing Eren.  With inhuman speed, Levi finally manages to stop the Female Titan.  Mikasa goes to deal the final blow, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Besiegten – Die 57. Expedition hinter die Mauer, Teil 6
Haisha-tachi: Dai 57 Kai Hekigai Chousa (6)
Les vaincus ~La 57e expédition extra-muros~
The Defeated: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (6)
敗者達 第57回壁外調査⑥

REGULAR.description:
The 57th expedition outside the walls had a hidden objective: to reveal the presence of an enemy within humanity, someone who could transform into a titan and who was plotting to destroy the walls.  However, the survey corps failed in this goal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Lächeln – Sturm auf den Bezirk Stohess, Teil 1
Hohoemi: Stohess-ku Kyuushuu (1)
Smile: Raid on Stohess District (1)
Sourire ~Attaque surprise au district de Stohess~
微笑み ストヘス区急襲①

REGULAR.description:
Eren Mikasa and Armin succeed in following the plan and lureing Annie to the entrance of the underground corridor.  However, Annie realizes Armin`s intentions and transforms, and tries desperately to try and capture Eren.  They escape into the corridor while Annie attacks them from above. Eren attempts to transform to protect the other two, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jihi: Stohess-ku Kyuushuu (2)
Mercy: Raid on Stohess District (2)
Mitleid – Sturm auf den Bezirk Stohess, Teil 2
Pitié ~Attaque surprise au district de Stohess~
慈悲 ストヘス区急襲②

REGULAR.description:
Eren goes head-to-head with the Female Titan in a fight that demolishes the Stohess District inside Wall Sina. As the number of casualties skyrockets and Annie tries to escape over the wall, Erwin must deal with the consequences of his plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Mauer – Sturm auf den Bezirk Stohess, Teil 3
Kabe: Stohess-ku Kyuushuu (3)
Mur ~Attaque surprise au district de Stohess~
The Wall: Raid on Stohess District (3)
壁 ストヘス区急襲③

SPECIAL.description:
A recap of episodes 1 to 13.
Source: crunchyroll

Depuis l`autre jour
Since That Day
